Quoting Ahnu Nahki <ahnunahki@...>:

> I have a java class that starts heritrix in run mode without the gui.
> Everything works great except I dont see a switch to shut heritrix
> from within the shell. There is one within the gui, but we do not plan
> on using the gui. Is there a switch i,e 'heritrix --shutdown' that
> will shut it down from within the shell? And if not, why wasnt there
> one put in place. I hate to criticize such an excellent product, but
> doing kill,killall IMO doesnt make sense when you can have a shutdown
> method via command line parameter. 
> 
> -Ahnu
